product_overview: eBazer / Razia is a full-stack e-commerce platform that provides both an admin dashboard for managing products, orders, and users, and a dynamic user-facing storefront for shopping with features like product browsing, filtering, and an outfit builder. It supports bilingual content (English/Arabic), transaction-safe order processing, and modern UI/UX practices.
core_goals: Provide a scalable and secure e-commerce system supporting English and Arabic languages.
Enable seamless management of products, categories, orders, and users via a comprehensive admin dashboard.
Deliver a responsive, intuitive user storefront with features such as product listing, detailed product pages, filtering, sorting, and checkout.
Ensure transaction safety and integrity in order processing to prevent issues like overselling.
Incorporate advanced product attribute management (colors, sizes), multi-image uploads, and real-time product data fetching.
Facilitate an engaging shopping experience through interactive tools such as the Outfit Builder.
key_features: RESTful API backend with transaction-safe order processing and caching via Redis.
Static admin panel for product lifecycle management, user role management, and analytics visualization.
React-based user storefront utilizing shadcn-ui and Tailwind CSS for responsive, modern interface.
Comprehensive product listing page with filtering and sorting capabilities.
Authentication system for user login and registration.
Complete checkout workflow including address selection and payment integration setup.
User profile management with order history and settings.
Interactive Outfit Builder tool for creating and visualizing outfits.
Centralized logging and audit trails for critical operations to ensure security and traceability.
user_flow_summary: User visits Shop page to browse products, use filters and sorting, then views product details.
User registers or logs in via Authentication page to access additional features.
User adds products to cart, proceeds to Checkout for address and payment processing, then places order.
User accesses Profile page to view order history and manage personal settings.
Admin logs into eBazer Dashboard to manage products, orders, and users, and review analytics.
User uses Outfit Builder to create custom outfit combinations and visualize them interactively.
validation_criteria: All API endpoints return correct, secure JSON responses and enforce authentication.
Product listings display accurate data with applied filters and sorting correctly reflected.
Checkout process completes successfully with transaction safety confirmed via backend locking mechanisms.
User authentication and registration workflows are functional and secure.
Admin dashboard actions (create, update, delete) correctly modify the backend and update UI accordingly.
Outfit Builder functions with real-time interaction and correct data visualization.
Multi-image upload and enhanced product attribute selectors are fully operational.
System performance meets responsiveness criteria and logging captures essential analytics and errors.
